Dance to a song of the group’s choice for one minute.
Let the group style your hair and leave it that way for the entire game.
Do your best impression of someone in the room until someone guesses who it is.
What’s a habit or trait you have that you’re embarrassed about?
Let someone write a funny message on your arm using a permanent marker.
Wear socks on your hands for the next 5 rounds.
Share the last photo you took on your phone.
Wear a piece of clothing inside out for the next 3 rounds.
Let someone tickle you for 30 seconds.
Do your best runway walk across the room.
Wear a blanket as a cape for the rest of the game.
Let someone else choose a song, and you have to lip-sync to it with enthusiasm.
Try to fit as many marshmallows in your mouth as you can.
Do a freestyle dance.
Do a sock puppet show.
Have a deep conversation with an item of furniture.
Avoid saying “like” for the rest of the game.
Sing all your responses.
Plank for 1 minute.
Tell each player who you think their celebrity look-alike is.
Act like a chicken until your next turn.
Imitate the way someone in the room walks.
Give someone a piggyback ride.
Pretend to be someone in the room for 5 minutes.
Stand on a chair and give a dramatic speech about something random.
Put whipped cream on your nose and try to lick it off.
Crack an egg on your head.
Say 3 honest things to the group.
Eat a leaf.
Share the most recent thing you Googled.
Fill your mouth with water and try not to laugh. The group has 30 seconds to make you laugh.
Let the group pet you as if you are a dog for 1 minute.
Whisper a secret to the person on your right.
Call your mom and ask for a ridiculous amount of money.
Send a random embarrassing selfie to the last person you texted.
Play footsie with the person across from you.
Do and post a TikTok dance of the group’s choosing.
Call the last person you texted and just “meow” into the phone.
Pretend to be the opposite sex for the next 10 minutes.
Read the last text message you sent out loud.
